verbose_text: In contrast, the increase in endoplasmic reticulum stress, indicated by Bip1 and CHOP induction, as a result of VCP knockdown can be fully rescued by both wild-type and mutant VCP (XREF_FIG A), consistent with their similar abilities to clear cytosolic polyubiquitinated proteins (XREF_FIG B).
evidence: result of VCP knockdown can be fully rescued by both wild-type and mutant VCP
